ygData.subject: Re: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, you are in the wrong class if you are big on looks my friend, until you can get to PoF and get the Mist Armor. You wanna be a good cleric? Mostly
ygData.messageBody:
>I was curious as to the types of plate armor available to us


Well, you are in the wrong class if you are big on looks my friend, until
you can get to PoF and get the Mist Armor.
You wanna be a good cleric? Mostly likely the answer is yes.
Then you will look like a newbie.
Any items with Wis increasing stats are going to look incredibly ridiculous
Now, i should have gone to fear by now myself, unfortunately my regular
group is not high enough to go as of yet(our lowest person is lvl45)
-But i am still wearing Gator legs (wis stat, looks like leather)
-BS tunic( wis stat ,red chain, should be getting runed Mith tunic soon)
-Runed mithril bracers(wis stat, lavender plate)
-Dwarven Wboots(no wis, but can't get the efreeti boots yet, they are
silver in color on me as a human)
-Snakeskin Gloves(adds dex, don't know of any Wis gloves, they have the look
of leather)

One good thing is I don't have Newbies looking at my stuff constantly, but
that is only because I look like a complete ass in my armor.

Bree Wyndsdale
47th cleric of Fennin Ro
High Priestess of the MoD
